Title: The Night Porter
Writer: Liliana Cavani (screenplay), Italo Moscati (screenplay), Barbara Alberti (collaborator on the screenplay), Amedeo Pagani (collaborator on the screenplay), Liliana Cavani (story), Barbara Alberti (story), Amedeo Pagani (story)
Actors: Dirk Bogarde, Charlotte Rampling, Philippe Leroy, Gabriele Ferzetti
Plot: Thirteen years after WWII a concentration camp survivor (Rampling) and her tormentor, currently the night porter at a Vienna hotel, meet again and fall back into their sado-masochistic relationship.
